Text: An afterthought - I'll continue uploading Evil Genius and Hawk scans as they are released...
Seed! I can't carry my swarm alone.

This torrent is not only up-to-date but it has high-quality scans of the early volumes! Most copies of volumes 1-3 on the net are tiny blurry images, but not these ones.

I'm seeding this to 20.0. Thank you!

Thanks for the upload! Much appreciated this is awesome. 

How up to date is this? This is the only manga I read but I'm not sure how to acquire the latest chapters.
It is up to date give or take two chapters. Google Evil Genius if you want to find the source of many scanalations.
